Suien uses this technique to amplify his voice to a very high-pitched sound, making it loud enough to be heard throughout all of [[Takigakure]].

== Trivia ==
* A "[[wikipedia:Kodama (spirit)|kodama]]" is a tree spirit from Japanese folklore that can create sounds with a delayed echoing effect in mountains and valleys — a phenomenon that is sometimes referred to as "[[wikipedia:Yamabiko (folklore)|Yamabiko]]".
